name: HartWig
description:
Do you want to play a HARD GAME?!
Play HartWig your hart will rise.

The Buttons that you can you in this game are: Spacebar And D of Shift.
The game is a fastpaced side scroller. You can slow time by using dark magic that you obtain by, draining your enemys or take dark orbs.

Enjoy my game and command your highscore!
